timeline.bodyText:
Can you replace with using assertJ matchers?
I'm actually kind of surprised this compiles - we switched from hamcrest to assertj a while back, and I thought we would have removed the hamcrest libs from the build path.
timeline.author: jeenbroekstra

replies.bodyText: Ah, of course, I keep forgetting that hamcrest core is actually a dependency of Junit 4... Still, I'd prefer if we stuck to assertJ instead of hamcrest, as a matter of consistency.
replies.author: jeenbroekstra

replies.bodyText: I've fixed this now. Maybe we should exclude hamcrest in our pom files?
replies.author: hmottestad

timeline.message:
